name: grunt-shopify-wsync
description: This is a package is based on the package grunt-shopify by wilr. grunt-shopify-wsync is basically the same package but with the option to sync a live theme with a secondary theme (this is a complete overwrite process, ALL FILES WILL BE OVERWRITTEN between the theme and sync theme).
author: Hassan <hassan.b.mehdi@gmail.com> (http://hassan.xyz/)
